general_advisory: Conserve rainwater for utilization in land preparation by making bund and clogging the pores inside the field. Make necessary arrangements for field preparation as monsoon has already entered our state. Farmers are advised to provide necessary irrigation to the standing crops and keep fields free from weeds. Regular monitoring for insect pest incidence and pesticide application should be done by observing weather forecast. Farmers are advised to undertake soil test for Kharif crops.
